title: Molecular mechanisms of inhibition of P2X7 receptor by novel antagonists and activation by ADP-ribosylating ectoenzymes
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: The research provides an better understanding of the molecular mechanisms underpinning P2X7-mediated physiological functions and particularly human diseases. In addition, the structural and molecular mechanisms are useful knowledge for rationalizing the drug discovery approaches to this increasingly attractive drug target (P2X7) for the pharmaceutical sector.
